result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua J Reeverts was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

11:08 am   TO INCLUDE 14CF141, 14CF206, 14CF217, 14CM193, 14CM222, 14CM244, 14CT244, 14CT126, 14CT136, 14TR503 & 14TR1045
Defendant Joshua J Reeverts in court with attorney Liesl E. Nelson.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Thorie:  plea agreement is: 14CF206: file amended information amending the Burg to simple Burglary.  14CM206 3 year DPA - comply with probation.  3 yr DJOC on 14CF141 - forgery charge - 3 yrs - comply with probation,  14CM193 - plead to Ct 1 4th deg sex assault - dismiss Ct 2,  14CT126 OWI 1st with minor - plea guilty to that charge   14CM222 - guilty to Ct 1(NOW CORRECTED TO CT 2, dismissing remainder of charges). Nelson stips to the facts. Nelson stips to the facts.    COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY,  INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of Ct 3 theft.  14CM193: Def pleads guilty to Ct 1 4th deg sex assault. COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of 4th degree sex assault.  Ct 2 of 14CM222 Def pleads guilty to Fraud Use of Credit Card.  Nelson stips to the facts.    COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty if Ct 2.   14CT126 - Def pleads guilty to OWI with minor child.
